line.comment: * the Nomad faction consumes an abstracted resource that they get when refugees reach their flagship
* we always start with updating our global resource lists
* random chance to save our Nomad resource

line.text: ' build cycle. They decided to save their nomad resource'

line.comment: * up to 1 recycler for each X sectors in the galaxy (t-file setting, default 9)
* at least 1 recycler in the galaxy
* chance to build mercs gets higher when enough recyclers and traders exist
* no more than 8 merc groups in each build cycle
* if we're not building mercs we fill up our desired quota for TL recyclers and their Traders
* once we have built some mercs there is a chance that we stop building anything else in this cycle
* no more than 2 TLs in each build cycle
* yes, practically infinite cargospace is just much easier and better for these
* higher player infamy increases the chance to spawn protection escorts for all neutrals. These security ships are always free

up to 5 traders per recycler
at least 1 recycler in the galaxy
at least 2 traders per recycler
chance to build mercs gets higher when enough recyclers and traders exist
no more than 8 merc groups in each build cycle
if we're not building mercs we fill up our desired quota for TL recyclers and their Traders
once we have built some mercs there is a chance that we stop building anything else in this cycle
no more than 2 TLs in each build cycle
yes, practically infinite cargospace is just much easier and better for these

write to player logbook $t
higher player infamy increases the chance to spawn protection escorts for all neutrals. These security ships are always free
